Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I'm not much into using forums, in fact, this is the first post to any forum in more than 5 years in my life. I guess want to become part of this community and exchange experiences and knowledge 'bout physics because I liked all I've seen here in the forum.

As an electrical engineer in Brazil I would be really glad if there is anyone from here (or anywhere, really) with whom I can chat about applications of electrical engineering on aerospace related stuff.

Looking forward to know you.

Welcome to the forum. I don't join many of them, either. 

You are of course welcome in the English sections of the forum (which is most of them), but you'll likely find most of your fellow Brazilians in the Portuguese sub as well.
Welcome to the forums and the community!
